item.title: Adam
item.description: I met Adam in an paradoxically opposed situation when compared to this project that he ended up in - a contrast of bits and bytes vs. the physical medium. This paradox is also characteristic of the place that the photos were taken at - fond yet also melancholic memories of where he grew up.

item.title: Anam
item.description: With Anam, things just flow, we just met up on a day we could meet, and took photos around the neighbourhood.
item.content:encoded:
With Anam, things just flow, we just met up on a day we could meet, and took photos around the neighbourhood. We talked about how amazing the light where we live at is. We realised that you do not have to go to the ends of the world to take breath-taking (or just decent) images. Oftentimes, you can have them right outside your door.
